about_the_game:
Blitz is a challenging, fast-paced platformer with infinite procedurally generated levels. Build a new unique character each run and fight one action-packed room after another! With multiple game modes you will be able to master movement, combat, and strategy in this fast paced experience.

Infinite Procedural Dungeons:

  • No 2 dungeons are the same

  • Maps get bigger and more difficult as you progress

  • Replay Value (30+ hours of gameplay)

  • Many gameplay soundtracks

Craft your Character:

  • Build the ultimate character by leveling up to fit your playstyle

  • Traits: Pick through dozens of unique traits to become more powerful

  • Attributes: Select one of the 5 main attributes upon level up (See Below)

  • Strength - Melee Damage, Kick Power, and Knockback

  • Dexterity - Ranged Damage, Reload Speed, Recoil Control, and Arrow Power

  • Agility - Jump Height

  • Speed - Movement Speed on ground and midair.

  • Sight - Overall Camera FOV

All the loot:

  • Many many weapons (Guns, Bows, Swords, Rocket Launchers)

  • Armor - Many Armor Types with increasing damage resistance

  • Cover - Deploy cover to aid you in battle (A team to fight alongside you, a crate to shoot behind

  • Throwables - A boatload of Grenades, Spears, Blades, etc.

  • Gold - Use this to buy from traders

Advanced Ai:

  • Dozens of base enemies that evolve in further stages

  • Enemies level up and evolve like the character

  • A wide range of difficulty settings for any skill level

Game Modes:

  • Dungeon: Fight your way through ominous procedurally generated dungeons, defeating one boss after the other. Find loot, trade with NPCs and craft your character into something unstoppable.

  • Survival: Survive wave after wave of enemies putting your movement and combat skill to the test.

  • The Climb: Similar to Jump Knight or Getting over it. Scale a huge vertical map in an attempt to obtain legendary status.

  • Gladiator: Fight through increasingly difficult arenas, stacking gold and buying equipment to become stronger.

name: Blitz Demo

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 x64
  • Processor: Dual-Core Intel or AMD processor
  • Graphics: GTX 1050ti
  • Storage: 1 GB available space

short_description: Blitz is a challenging, fast-paced platformer with infinite procedurally generated levels. Build a new unique character each run and fight one action-packed room after another! Dropkick, decapitate, and incinerate your foes. Do you have what it takes to conquer Blitz?
